thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 18 of 135
thread.title: Rashid
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Rashid

author: Rashid
title: Rashid
text:
I went into the store knowing what to purchase and Dana was fast to get our order ready/completed in a quick manner. I guess only thing that got me frustrated was the delivery and additional warranty that was offered. The manufacturers warranty was not good, considering that if anything happens to the merchandise I will have to physically bring the furniture to the store? Which is not a good service experience.
Overall I was happy with the furniture and have not gotten it delivered yet so, look forward to enjoying the pieces in my new home.
